stages.text: Can't you read? The sign said NOT to press the button!
What part of 'DON'T' was unclear?
Well then...
I feel I may need to make this more difficult...
How about... NOW!
I fear I may have underestimated you...
Fine, whatever. What do I know?  Go ahead and press it.
What do I care anyway?
It's just a big red button, after all.
Besides, who wants to press a silly button anyway?
.   .   .
.     .     .
...Alright it seems ignoring you isn't changing anything
Time to get creative...
BEHOLD!!!

text.failed: Looks like you aren't as clever as you thought!!

stages.text: So... Still pressing that button huh?
You think there'll be something at the end of this road.
Did you ever consider that there might not be...
That this might just go on and on?
...and on and on...
...and on and on...
...and on and on...
Alright, Stop!
STOP!
...I now suspect you to be illiterate.
Guess I'll have to stop you myself...
Take That!
Well, that wasn't supposed to happen.
I thought I had you that time for sure.
Guess it's time to try something completely new...
See how you go with this one!
Let the waters RISE!
Great, now the carpet is all wet! See what you made me do?
I guess it's time to go back to the drawing board!
Literally, here's a drawing... on a board...!
Can you... Can you not touch my artwork?
Didn't anyone ever teach you that? I mean, really!
You're smudging the pixels! STOP!!
You don't deserve my beautiful masterpiece!
There, it's gone, ARE YOU HAPPY?
Way to kill my dreams. You've crushed them!
CRUSHED! Just like you wanted...
Does my misery somehow appease you?
Or are you too cruel to even care or notice?
Do you even know how long you've been pushing this button?
You know, studies show that people who press buttons repeatedly are inherently stupid?
I'm not saying you're stupid, just outlining the facts.
And since the facts determine you might be stupid, I figured someone ought to tell you.
So you could go wherever it is they help those who are stupid.
I don't really care, it just seems like something you should have looked at.
By someone who knows how to deal with people like you.
There are probably herds of them, those of your kind I mean.
They probably gallop ignorantly in open fields and eat... grass!
I just realized it sounded like I was calling you a cow, that was unintentional.
If there is any truth to it, it really does sound like a great place for you to go.
Just think of it. Paradise.
I'm beginning to wonder if my comment on literacy wasn't right on the money.
I mean, you've ignored everything up until now.  Maybe we should test you.
Nothing too outlandish, maybe a color based test.
I'd hate to make it too difficult on you.
Are you ready?
Ok, press the blue button

text.failed: Ha, I knew I could get you to obey me! You CAN be reasoned with after all!
text.success: Yep... I knew you were incapable of listening to me!

stages.text: Now to more pressing matters...
You see, this button was not supposed to be pressed!
And yet here you are...
Pressing it...
With no real understanding of WHY you were told not to press it.
Did you think it was a suggestion? That the text was misleading?
If it alternatively had said 'PRESS', would you have pressed it?
If I were to change it now, you'd press it to spite me.
So, let's try a social experiment...
Consider... If you press the button ONE MORE TIME you will DIE!
Wow... Not even a hesitation... You press the button despite the risk of death.
Despite the remote chance that by pressing it once more you would have died.
You've become a slave to it, pressing the button purely because it is there.
Hoping that something will happen if you persist on.
That you will reap a reward for the time you have now wasted pressing a forbidden button.
You know, you actually remind me of someone.
I swear I've had this conversation once before.
I was sitting here minding my own business
without a care in the world, no dialog at all.
you want to know what I said to them? Press the button once more to find out, I said:

stages._comment: ----------THIS IS THE LAST RECORD, LEFT BLANK ON PURPOSE----------
